George Herman Ruth

Baseball statistics for George Herman Ruth (The Bambino or The Sultan Of Swat)

Format

A data frame with 22 observations on the following 14 variables.

Year
year in which the season occurred
Team
team he played for Bos-A, Bos-N, or NY-A
G
games played
AB
at bats
R
runs scored
H
hits
X2B
doubles
X3B
triples
HR
home runs
RBI
runs batted in
SB
stolen bases
BB
base on balls or walks
BA
batting average H/AB
SLG
slugging percentage (total bases/at bats)

Source

http://www.baseball-reference.com/about/bat_glossary.shtml

References

Ugarte, M. D., Militino, A. F., and Arnholt, A. T. (2008) Probability and Statistics with R. Chapman & Hall/CRC.

Examples

with(data = Baberuth,
hist(RBI))
